actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Wheat, Soybeans, and Feed Grains.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Wheat, Soybeans, and Feed Grains

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 with respect to loan rates and target prices for wheat and feed grains, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Family Farm Survival Act of 1985 - Title I: Wheat - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to extend price supports for wheat through 1989. Establishes the price at: (1) $5.25 per bushel for 1986; (2) $5.41 per bushel for 1987; (3) $5.57 per bushel for 1988; and (4) $5.74 per bushel for 1989. Suspends specified quota and certificate provisions. Title II: Feed Grains - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to extend price supports for feed grains through 1989. Establishes the price for corn at: (1) $3.56 per bushel for 1986; (2) $3.67 per bushel for 1987; (3) $3.78 per bushel for 1988; and (4) $3.89 per bushel for 1989. Title III: Loan and Purchase Limitations for Wheat and Feed Grains - Sets limits on 1986 through 1989 wheat and feed grain loans and purchases.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 with respect to loan rates and target prices for wheat and feed grains, and for other purposes.
